description: TFT Network was born from the idea of creating a project based on giving a complete solution for private digital transactions. Our mission is to build a solid community, a community that is a constant participant in this project. TFTN cryptocurrency is based on the technology provided by Cryptonote, this allows security, fast and privacy for all transactions. The TFT Network Team will be developing new technologies and new products so that the project continues to improve and grow.
name: TFT Network
